rules_text:
Whenever White-Water Canoe attacks, reveal the top card of your library. If a land card is revealed this way, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on White-Water Canoe, then you may mill a card.
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
